name: Magnetic Tool Holder Storage Organizer: 7-Piece Garage Wall Mount Rack Organization Strip Power Magnet Organizers Mounted Workbench Board Slatwall Van Hanger
short_description: EXCEPTIONAL DURABILITY - Boasting of high-quality alloy steel construction, this Magnetic Tool Holder Storage Organizer provides unmatched sturdiness and longevity. The power magnet strip is a heavy-duty solution for tool organization.

EASY INSTALLATION - This wall-mounted tool organizer comes with all the necessary accessories, including mounting screws, enabling effortless installation. It's a space-efficient choice for your garage, workbench, or kitchen, freeing up countertops and drawers.

POWERFUL ORGANIZATION - Say goodbye to messy tool boxes and welcome streamlined organization with this Magnetic Tool Holder. It can comfortably house your pliers, wrenches, and screwdrivers, making your workbench more accessible and efficient.

ADAPTIVE DESIGN - This 7-piece storage organizer can be easily mounted on any slatwall, making it an ideal choice for van hangers or shelving units. Its magnetic strips double as a key holder, making it a comprehensive solution for all your storage needs.

HANDY EXTRA - As a magnetic trouser clip, the tool holder can easily attach to your belt, securing screws, bits, and small tools. This makes for efficient work, even in hard-to-reach places. It holds up to 11 kilograms of materials vertically, facilitating effortless tool accessibility.

name: Navaris Set of 3 Magnetic Tool Holder Rack - 24 Inch Heavy Duty Garage Wall Holder Strip for Tools - Tool Bar with Magnet for Screwdriver, Wrench
short_description: Steel

POWERFUL: Keep your tools off the floor and well organized with the strong magnetic tool holders. Powerful magnets hold tools in place, creating the most efficient way to keep your most used tools organized and handy at all times.

STRONG WEIGHT CAPACITY: The heavy-duty magnetic tool racks can hold several tools weighing up to 30 lbs (13.6 kg). They're not only powerful, but also a space saver as they provide the perfect storage space for all your important tools.

USE FOR: Useful for mounting anything from a screwdriver, hammer, wrench, scissors, screws, ratchet, pliers, spanner, blades, drill bits and knives to other kinds of ferrous metallic objects and gardening tools.
EASY TO INSTALL: Simply fix the bar to the wall of your garage, workshop or shed with screws (included in the delivery).
SPECS: Each magnetic tool organizer measures 24" in length (61 cm) and can hold up to 30 lbs in weight (13.6 kg).

name: ULIBERMAGNET Magnetic Screwdriver Holder,Heavy Duty Pliers Metal Organizer Rack,Wall Mount Garage Organizer for Screwdriver, Plier, Shears,Tools Holder Rack for Garage,Tool Cart,Pegboards,Workbench
short_description: [Magnetic Screwdriver Storage Rack]: The screwdriver storage rack helps you organize your messy workbench and perfectly arrange screwdrivers, pliers and other tools. No more digging through a messy toolbox

[Heavy Duty Plier Tool Holder]: The magnetic tool holder is made of heavy-duty metal steel with reinforcements and welds on the rack, making the tool holder stronger and preventing the storage rack from breaking easily, thus protecting your tools

[Utility Storage Tools Rack]: The bottom of the holder has a rubber magnet, which has strong force and anti-slip resistance to ensure that the rack will not slide during use. It can be installed on tool carts, workbench, pegboard and other metal surfaces

[Organize Your Space]: The magnetic pliers rack has 2 layers, each layer has 18 slots of different sizes to accommodate different types and sizes of tools. You can put different tools into the corresponding slots as needed for easy access
[Easy to Install]: The magnetic screwdriver holder is simple to use and can be removed at will without any accessories.Quick way to add some organization space to the workshop

name: DURATECH 4 Pack 12" Magnetic Tool Holder Strip, Heavy Duty Magnetic Tool Bar, Magnetic Space Saving Tool Organizer with Mounting Screws for Garage, Workshop, Kitchen
short_description: GET RID OF MESSY TOOLBOX: The magnetic tool holder keep your tools and other metal objects organized and in one place. The magnetic bar takes very little space, and using it will help you get rid of messy toolbox, easily hold your wrenches, screwdrivers, spanners and keep them organized.

MAGNETIC TOOL HOLDERS: 12 inch heavy duty tool holder bars with strong magnet, each bar can hold about 22 lbs. For having a larger weight capacity, you can install multiple magnetic tool bars side by side. Our magnetic tool bar is made of premium alloy steel, which guarantees magnetic tool organizer is sturdy and durable.

EASY TO INSTALL: Simply use the included mounting screw to fix the tool organizer bracket to the wall of your garage, workshop or shed. The magnetic tool holder is also expandable by connecting multiple strips.

WIDE APPLICATION: The heavy-duty magnetic tool rack is efficient magnetic tool organize for garages, workshops, kitchens. You can use them hold knives and cutlery in your kitchen, or screwdrivers, saw blades in your workshop, or socket and ratchet handle in your garage.
PACKAGE INCLUDING: The magnetic tool bar set including 4 pieces of 12-inch strips, brackets, and mounting screws. Save counter and drawer space with DURATECH magnetic tool holder.

name: 6Pcs 35mm JIS Screwdriver Bit Set with Magnetic Tip, 1/4 Hex Shank, S2 Alloy Steel & 6-Slot Storage Strip – Perfect for Japanese Motorcycles, Cars, Bicycles, and Equipment (JIS #1x6)
short_description: 1. **Specifically Designed for Japanese (JIS) Screws**: Manufactured to JIS B4633 standards, these bits are engineered to fit screws commonly found in **Japanese motorcycles, vehicles, bicycles**, and equipment, including brands like **Honda, Suzuki**, and **Shimano**. By using the correct JIS bit, you can avoid stripping or damaging screws, protecting your equipment for longer use.

2. **Durable S2 Alloy Steel Construction**: Crafted from **S2 alloy steel**, known for its **hardness, strength**, and **impact resistance**, these JIS bits are designed for long-lasting, heavy-duty performance in various applications.

3. **Versatile Applications**: Perfect for household DIY projects, woodworking, automotive repairs, and professional machine maintenance. The 1/4" hex shank fits drills and U.S. driver systems, compatible with pneumatic, electric, and hand screwdrivers, including major brands like Bosch, Milwaukee, DeWalt, Metabo, and Makita. Additionally, JIS screwdriver bits are also compatible with Phillips screws: **#1 is suited for PH1, #2 for PH2, and #3 for PH3**, making this set ideal for a wide range of tasks and screw types.
4. **Magnetic Tip for Enhanced Performance**: Each bit features a **magnetic tip**, providing a secure grip on screws and reducing the risk of dropping or misplacing screws during work.

5. **Complete Set Includes**: This set comes with **six 35mm-length JIS screwdriver bits** and a **compact 6-slot storage strip** for easy organization and accessibility. Perfect for mechanics, hobbyists, and professionals alike.

name: Amartisan 10-Piece Magnetic Screwdrivers Set, 5 Phillips and 5 Slotted Tips Professional Cushion Grip Screwdriver Set
short_description: Top quality magnetic screwdriver set, 10 professional grade screwdrivers that are designed to serve a multitude of uses.
Premium materials, the screwdriver bar is made of chromium vanadium steel for durable. Black finish blade with magnetic tips which could conveniently attracts screws
Cushion grip handle for comfort and control,With ergonomic TPR handle, it helps you to use very easily
Including 2 kinds of portable key screwdriver(flathead screwdriver and phillips screwdriver)
Convenient storage, Each set of screwdrivers is equipped with a transparent storage bucket to prevent loss.

name: Williams JHWWRS-1 Magnetic Multi-bit Ratcheting Screwdriver, 9-Inch
short_description: 9-Inch long; 4-Inch Blade Length; Includes 5 bits: 2 Slotted, #1 Phillips, #2 Phillips and T-15 TORX Bit
Ergonomically designed hi-impact handle provides greater comfort and control for the user, while also providing durability and flexibility in all types of work applications.
Heavy duty 3 way on off locked ratcheting mechanism allows consistent and smooth operation
Powerful magnetic shank securely holds bit in place before, during, after the job application
Accepts all standard 1/4" hex shank bits; handle features bit storange for quick access
product_description: The Williams Magnetic Ratcheting Screwdriver includes 5 bits: : 2 slotted, #1 Phillips®, #2 Phillips®, and T-15 TORX. The handle is ergonomically designed for great user comfort and control. The handle is made with hi-impact plastic for durability and flexibility in all types of work applications. The heavy-duty 3-way on-off-locked ratcheting mechanism allows consistent and smooth operation. The powerful magnetic shank securely holds the bit in place before, during and after the job application. The stainless steel shank protects the tools chrome finish. The screwdriver accepts all standard ¼” hex shank bits that are easy stored in the handle. This product is made in the United States. For over 140 years, Williams has manufactured high quality industrial tools for professionals like you.  Every day we purposefully choose our next product innovation by examining and understanding your needs, because we know you value your work and pride yourself in being the best. We develop tools strong enough to endure extreme industrial conditions.  Leveraging our heritage of making great tools, with the right materials, and precise engineering specifications. Since 1882, Williams had made products designed to be put to work with confidence.

name: 6Pcs 50mm JIS Screwdriver Bit Set with Magnetic Tip,1/4 Hex Shank, S2 Alloy Steel & 6-Hole Storage Strip-erfect for Japanese Motorcycles, Cars，Bicycle & Equipment (JIS #1x6)
short_description: 1. **Designed for Japanese Standard (JIS) Screws**: Made according to the JIS B4633 Standard, specifically crafted for use on classic Japanese motorcycles, cars, bicycles, and equipment, e.g., Honda and Suzuki motorcycles, Shimano bicycle accessories, etc. The correct JIS bit helps prevent cam-out and damage to the screws, while also providing better protection for the equipment.
2. **High-Quality Materials**: The magnetic JIS screwdriver bits are made from S2 alloy steel, characterized by high hardness, strength, and impact resistance.

3. **Wide Application**: Ideal for household DIY, woodworking, auto parts, and professional machine repair. The 1/4" hex shank is suitable for use in drills and U.S. drivers, compatible with pneumatic, electric, and hand screwdrivers, as well as major brands like Bosch, Milwaukee, DeWalt, Metabo, and Makita. The JIS screwdriver bits will also work with Phillips screws： **#1 is suited for PH1, #2 for PH2, and #3 for PH3**,
4. **Magnetic Design**: The tip of the screwdriver bit is magnetic, ensuring a better grip on screws during work.
5. **Includes**: Six 50mm-length screwdriver bits and one 6-hole screwdriver bit storage strip.

name: Mayouko Magnetic Plier Holder, 10 Plier&Screwdriver Organizer Rack, Hand Tool Organizer Tray Rack
short_description: It holds up to 10 pliers.The semi-open design allows you to quickly identify the tools you want and easily pick them.
The 4 magnets on the back allows the plier organizer to be placed on most metallic surfaces,which is easy to use and move.
The appropriate slot width is suitable for most tools.Whether it is a screwdriver, a wrench or a plier, all can be easily accommodated.
Efficiently and intuitively organize your pliers and other tools. Perfect for hanging in your tool chest, cabinet, work station, or garage.Get rid of clutter and say hello to neat.
Our plier holder rack can be placed vertically or horizontally ,the uses for our magnetic tool holder are endless and easily adapts to a large array of situations.

name: UCINNOVATE Magnetic Tool Holder Bar, 2 Pack 8” Heavy-Duty Tool Organizer for Garage, Workshop & Home Use, Easy Installation Secure Storage for Wrenches, Screwdrivers, Pliers, and Hand Tools
short_description: Strong Magnetic Tool Holder Bar for Secure Storage: This magnetic tool holder bar features a powerful magnet that securely holds all your essential hand tools, including screwdrivers, wrenches, pliers, and more. Perfect for workshops, garages, and tool sheds, it keeps your tools organized and within easy reach.

Space Saving Design for a Clutter Free Workspace: The magnetic tool holder bar offers a compact and space saving solution for your tool storage needs. It’s perfect for organizing tools vertically, freeing up workbench space, and reducing clutter in your workshop or garage.

Premium Durability with Easy Installation: Made from high quality materials, this tool holder bar is built to last and withstand the daily demands of your workspace. The easy installation process allows you to mount it quickly on any metal surface—no screws or drilling required.

Versatile Tool Organization for DIYers: Ideal for both DIY enthusiasts and professionals, this magnetic tool holder bar is perfect for organizing a wide range of tools, from hand tools to mechanic tools. It’s also great for home improvement projects, auto repairs, and mechanic shops.

Magnetic Strip Bar for Tool Protection: The magnetic design ensures that your tools stay firmly while being securely held in place, offering both strength and gentle support for delicate tools. Strong built-in magnet bar holds no less than 26lbs (12kg) per bar.
